Good evening and I hope all are having a great weekend.  Would someone 
please explain the following:
'The tetsu-ji of Nobuiye tsuba is strong and sometimes famous yakite 
shitate and jimon appears with prominent tetkotsu in mimi'.
It is taken from the collection notes of Mr. James Meyer.  Thanks much!
